title: Competency-Based Congenital Cardiology Practitioner Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic cardiology knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Real-time interactive learning in digital device-provided environments, with project-based assessments to strengthen practical skills

learning_goals: Learners can analyze congenital heart disease diagnostic protocols and design patient-specific application strategies
Learners can enhance clinical decision-making skills through EPAs (Entrustable Professional Activities)-based scenarios
Learners can apply critical thinking to complex cardiology problems using self-directed learning strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
